Create a G-Sync control parameters DTO.

public NVAPIGSyncControlParametersDto(_NVAPI_GSYNC_POLARITY polarity, _NVAPI_GSYNC_VIDEO_MODE videoMode, uint interval, _NVAPI_GSYNC_SYNC_SOURCE source, bool interlaceMode, bool syncSourceIsOutput, NVAPIGSyncDelayDto syncSkew, NVAPIGSyncDelayDto startupDelay, _NVAPI_GSYNC_MULTIPLY_DIVIDE_MODE multiplyDivideMode, byte multiplyDivideValue)

Parameters

polarity _NVAPI_GSYNC_POLARITY

Sync polarity.

videoMode _NVAPI_GSYNC_VIDEO_MODE

Video mode.

interval uint

Sync interval.

source _NVAPI_GSYNC_SYNC_SOURCE

Sync source.

interlaceMode bool

Whether interlace mode is enabled.

syncSourceIsOutput bool

Whether the sync source is the output.

syncSkew NVAPIGSyncDelayDto

Sync skew delay.

startupDelay NVAPIGSyncDelayDto

Startup delay.

multiplyDivideMode _NVAPI_GSYNC_MULTIPLY_DIVIDE_MODE

Multiply/divide mode.

multiplyDivideValue byte

Multiply/divide value.
